name: fsl_anat
author: FMRIB Software Library (FSL) developers
description: A wrapper for FSL tools to process anatomical scans.

inputs.description: Filename of input image (for one image only)
inputs.name: Structural Image

inputs.description: Directory name for existing .anat directory where this script will be run in place
inputs.name: Existing Anat Directory

inputs.description: Basename of directory for output (default is input image basename followed by .anat)
inputs.name: Output Directory

inputs.description: If .anat directory exists (as specified by -o or default from -i) then delete it and make a new one
inputs.name: Clobber Flag

inputs.description: Used for images with very strong bias fields
inputs.name: Strong Bias Flag

inputs.description: Used for images with smoother, more typical, bias fields (default setting)
inputs.name: Weak Bias Flag

inputs.description: Turn off step that does reorientation to standard (fslreorient2std)
inputs.name: No Reorient Flag

inputs.description: Turn off step that does automated cropping (robustfov)
inputs.name: No Crop Flag

inputs.description: Turn off steps that do bias field correction (via FAST)
inputs.name: No Bias Correction Flag

inputs.description: Turn off steps that do registration to standard (FLIRT and FNIRT)
inputs.name: No Registration Flag

inputs.description: Turn off step that does non-linear registration (FNIRT)
inputs.name: No Non-linear Registration Flag

inputs.description: Turn off step that does tissue-type segmentation (FAST)
inputs.name: No Segmentation Flag

inputs.description: Turn off step that does sub-cortical segmentation (FIRST)
inputs.name: No Sub-cortical Segmentation Flag

inputs.description: Specify the value for bias field smoothing (the -l option in FAST)
inputs.name: Bias Smoothing Value

inputs.description: Specify the type of image (choose one of T1 T2 PD - default is T1)
inputs.name: Image Type

inputs.description: Specify that linear registration uses the -nosearch option (FLIRT)
inputs.name: No Search Flag

inputs.description: Specify f parameter for BET (only used if not running non-linear reg and also wanting brain extraction done)
inputs.name: BET f Parameter

groups.description: Input options for specifying the structural image or existing anatomical directory
groups.name: Input Options
